error.message: The program can't start because MSVCR100.dll is missing from your computer. Try reinstalling the program to fix this problem.
error.comment: This error shows up in a Windows graphical error message dialogue that pops up in the user environment

diagnosis.summary: In Mozilla Firefox Windows builds, this error occurs when an attempt is made to run a yasm assembler, which has a dependency on C:\Windows\System32\msvcr100.dll and C:\Windows\SysWOW64\msvcr100.dll.

instructions: Install both the x86 and x64 Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 Redistributable packages

error.message: The program can't start because MSVCR120.dll is missing from your computer. Try reinstalling the program to fix this problem.
error.comment: This error shows up in a Windows graphical error message dialogue that pops up in the user environment

diagnosis.summary: In Mozilla Firefox Windows builds, this error occurs when an attempt is made to run a rustc compiler, which has a dependency on C:\Windows\System32\msvcr120.dll and C:\Windows\SysWOW64\msvcr120.dll.

instructions: Install both the x86 and x64 Microsoft Visual C++ 2013 Redistributable packages
